name: stjude_macs2
title: stjude_macs2
summary: This app removes multiple mapped reads, duplicated reads and calls peaks. It requires both ChIP bam file and control bam file as input.

inputSpec.name: parameter_file
inputSpec.label: file which has parameters passed from other app

inputSpec.name: genome
inputSpec.label: reference genome. mouse: mm9(MGSCv37), mm10(GRCm38); human: hg19(GRCh37), hg38(GRCh38); drosophila: dm3(BDGPr5)

inputSpec.name: bw_out
inputSpec.label: output wiggle files or not. The wiggle files can be uploaded to genome browser to view reads distribution along chromosomes.

inputSpec.name: rm_blackList
inputSpec.label: remove peaks from black list or not

inputSpec.name: is_rescue
inputSpec.label: rescue multiple mapped reads from specified regions or not

inputSpec.name: rescue_bed
inputSpec.label: bed file with regions to be rescued for multiple mapped reads. Should be matched with the reference genome.

inputSpec.name: fragment_size
inputSpec.label: run with a fixed fragment size (bp, has to be positive)

outputSpec.name: peak_bb
outputSpec.label: big bed file of identified peaks

outputSpec.name: peak_file_raw
outputSpec.label: raw peak file directly outputted from macs2 which has peak quality score.

outputSpec.name: ChIP_cc
outputSpec.label: cross correlation plot for ChIP experiment.

outputSpec.name: Control_cc
outputSpec.label: cross correlation plot for control experiment.

outputSpec.name: ChIP_bw
outputSpec.label: big wig file for ChIP sample

outputSpec.name: Control_bw
outputSpec.label: big wig file for control sample

outputSpec.name: macs2_log
outputSpec.label: log for macs2
outputSpec.help: cmd and software version are recorded.
